152.content: Okay. Let's get down to it, shall we? You can create your own Character and your own adventure, or you can browse mine.
152.title: Create or chose your Character

choices: Shrink all in my path, and instal helplessness and fear in the hearts of my foes
Make anything grow in size, and make all my almightly and willing slaves
1521.content:
My name is Shadowlore. I am a human sorcerer that has been wondering these lands for many generations, and for many more to come. And by 'these lands', i mean the land of Equestria. Home of the pony folk. Those who know how to use as they call it, the magic of friendship. Such a weakling little power, they believe it to be strong enough to overcome any and all obstacles that may stand in their way. They have yet to stand in my path, nor have they faced my magic. The magic of Shadowlore.


And what does my magical powers entail? Why, i can--
1521.title: Axel's MLP story

15213.content:
Yeah. When i said i was a sorcerer, i kinda lied. I don't know any real magic at all, just fake magic, the whole smoke and mirrors acting, that kinda thing. And when i said I've been wondering these lands for many generations, i kinda lied there too. I'm only 18 years old, but my family has been practicing magic since before Equestria was even established. And remember when i said that the ponies never crossed paths with me before? Well--


"Thief!" Rarity yelled as i ran out the door of her shop with some expensive merchandise.


"Oh come on Rarity! You always get new stuff in stock! Let other ponies less fortunate then you have some of their own for a change!" I yelled back as i heard Rarity's hooves not far behind.


"That's a lovely thought Shadowlore! But you're not a pony!" Rarity shouted as i ran around the corner and pulled a small amount of powder out of my pockets and blew it into Rarity's face as she rounded the corner.


"Ah! My eyes! Help! Somepony please help me!" Blinded, she knew she couldn't keep up the chase and began shouting instead for help form the other ponies. I knew it wouldn't be long before i encountered 'them', and sure enough, as i rounded the next corner that would lead me out of town, i bumped into none other than--
15213.title: Shadowlore the human and (not) sorcerer
